name: Cup and Saucer (gobelet litron et soucoupe deuxième grandeur)
maker: Ground color painted by Antoine Capelle, Painted reserve and cameos attributed to Pierre-André Le Guay, Gilded by Etienne-Henri Le Guay, et al
description: Cup and Saucer (gobelet litron et soucoupe deuxième grandeur); Ground color painted by Antoine Capelle (French, active 1745 - 1800), Painted reserve and cameos attributed to Pierre-André Le Guay (French, active 1772 - 1818), Gilded by Etienne-Henri Le Guay (French, 1719/1720 - about 1799), et al; Sèvres, France; 1781; Soft-paste porcelain; brown ground color (? merde d'oie); polychrome enamel decoration; enamels in imitation of jewels; gilding and gold foils; 7 × 9.4 cm (2 3/4 × 3 11/16 in.); 81.DE.28; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Cup and Saucer (gobelet litron et soucoupe deuxième grandeur)
medium: Soft-paste porcelain; brown ground color (? merde d'oie); polychrome enamel decoration; enamels in imitation of jewels; gilding and gold foils
